simple-facts.question: What is the meaning of lite?
simple-facts.expected_answer: It is a way of life at bits, a facade to hide all your inner pain. It means that the issue is 'light' or doesn't matter, which always isn't the case. Example: How is your CG? Lite bro

simple-facts.question: What is a verti?
simple-facts.expected_answer: Verti is the dream that a lot of freshers have. It is the chance to get upgraded to a better branch and is awarded to highly meritorious students.

simple-facts.question: what is the meaning of tuts?
simple-facts.expected_answer: tut means tutorial classes where you solve questions. Some tuts are evaluative like Engineering Graphics.

simple-facts.question: What is BST?
simple-facts.expected_answer: BST stands for Bitsian Standard Time, it varies from IST by atleast 30 minutes. Every event you attend will have BST

simple-facts.question: Where can I get news about events occuring on campus?
simple-facts.expected_answer: Facebook groups such as BPHC ShoutBox, BPHC Free Expression Group and Lost and Found BPHC are among the most important groups for news and notifications

simple-facts.question: What are some clubs that I can join?
simple-facts.expected_answer: You can join, Traders, CRUx, Wall street club, SEDS, IEEE, ARC, SAE, AEOLUS, ACM and much more.

simple-facts.question: What fests do we have on campus?
simple-facts.expected_answer: Fests include, Pearl, Atmos, Arena, Launchpad, Sanskriti and Verba Maximus. These happen every single year.

advice.question: Where to go for food? I missed lunch
advice.expected_answer: You can go to yummpy's, hotspot or vijay-vahini foods. Amul is located next to it, you can have an ice-cream dessert there.
